Class LoanRepository

java.lang.Object
com.lms.library.repository.LoanRepository
@Repository public class LoanRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing Loan entities. Provides data access operations for loans using an in-memory store.
Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Joel Silva
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • LoanRepository

      public LoanRepository()
      Default constructor for LoanRepository.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public Loan save(Loan loan)
      Saves a loan to the repository. If the loan has no ID, generates a new one automatically.
      Parameters:
      loan - the loan to save
      Returns:
      the saved loan with generated ID

    • findById

      public Optional<Loan> findById(Long id)
      Finds a loan by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the loan to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found loan, or empty if not found

    • findByMemberIdOrderByLoanDateDesc

      public List<Loan> findByMemberIdOrderByLoanDateDesc(Long memberId)
      Finds all loans for a specific member, ordered by loan date (newest first).
      Parameters:
      memberId - the ID of the member
      Returns:
      a list of loans for the member, sorted by loan date descending

    • findByIdWithMemberAndItems

      public Optional<Loan> findByIdWithMemberAndItems(Long id)
      Finds a loan by ID including member and items information. In this in-memory implementation, equivalent to findById.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the loan to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found loan with member and items, or empty if not found

    • findByIdWithItems

      public Optional<Loan> findByIdWithItems(Long id)
      Finds a loan by ID including items information. In this in-memory implementation, equivalent to findById.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the loan to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found loan with items, or empty if not found
